name: Falling Skies
summary:
Falling Skies is a "modern" take on the old classic "Asteroids" shooter. Inspiration for this game was based off Space Invaders and Galaga. 
 
Multiple Power ups for you to obtain to make your life easier! 
 
There are 5 unique levels with a big boss fight at the end! Its a short and sweet but a very engaging little game! Everything is hand drawn by myself and a friend.
